short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display random text or images on new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A personalized new tab experience that displays your curated collection of favorite texts and images randomly. Create categories to organize your content and let each new tab surprise you with memories, quotes, or inspiring images from your collection. 

Key Features:
- Organize content into custom categories
- Add both text snippets and images
- View random content on each new tab
- Set a default category or get content from all categories
- Easy backup and restore functionality
- Clean, distraction-free interface

Perfect for collecting quotes, memories, inspiration, study materials, or any content you want to revisit regularly through your browsing experience.
